name: Star-Lord
origin: Peter Quill, a human abducted from Earth as a child and raised by space pirates, becomes the leader of the Guardians of the Galaxy.
powers: Expert pilot, skilled hand-to-hand combatant, and access to advanced alien technology including weaponry and jet boots.
events: Forming the Guardians of the Galaxy, retrieving the Orb, and fighting against the Ravagers.
enemies: Ronan the Accuser, Ego the Living Planet, Thanos.
